name: Auto Negotiation
title: Toggle Auto Negotiation
description: Toogle 'Auto Negotiation'-Helper

name: Minimum Goods
title: Minimum Auto-Negotiating Goods
description: Set minimum goods required to do auto-negotiation

name: Show Abort Text
title: Quest Looper
description: Show the Quest which gets aborted in the Log

name: Setup RQ-Loop
title: RQ-Loop Setup
description: Setup Quests for RQ-Looper

name: Smart Attack
title: Smart Attack Settings
description: Change Settings for GBG SmartAttack

name: Old RQ-Loop
title: Use old RQ-Looper
description: Even if I don't recommend it, you can check here if you want to use the old RQ-Looper (reload required)

name: Saved Quests
title: Saved Quests for RQ-Looper
description: Here are those Quests which will the RQ-Looper use in each slot

name: Min Health
title: Min Unit Health
description: Set the minimum health a Unit should have to be choosen by the script for replacing. It will always use units with most health

name: Motivating
title: Motivation Rules
description:
You can select if the script should only motivate a small group of neighbors (top/bottom x neighbors). Everyone else will not get motivated

If number is equal to -1, all neighbors will get motivated!!

name: Snip Options
title: Sniping Options
description: You can filter the Sniping Output to show only GBs with min profit and/or max investment

name: Neighbors
title: Attacking Neighbor Rules
description:
You can select if the script should only attack a small group of neighbors (top/bottom x neighbors). Everyone else will not get attacked

If number is equal to -1, all neighbors will get attacked!!

name: PVP Arena V1
title: PVP Arena Mode
description: You can choose which opponent the script should attack in pvp arena till the attempts are done!!

name: Menu Slide
title: Menu Slide Direction
description: You can choose in which direction the menu should slide to!!

name: Language
title: Choose Language
description:
You can change the language of the UI and Log (History) to a supported Language!

You want to add your Language? Contact the admin in Discord!

name: Trade Packs
title: Set Trade Packs
description:
Change the Trade Pack which should be used for the Bulk Trader!
All Trades will be split into these Packs if possible

A good (default) Trade Pack is 200 : 350 (Offer : Needed)

name: Fight Speed
title: Configure Fight Speed
description: Add your Custom Fight Speeds here. If none are created, only a default (0 Seconds) will be shown!

name: GVG Alert
title: Subscribe to GVG Alerts
description: Select which Provinces you want to subscribe to get alerts if someone is attacking your sector

name: Use Safety Mode
title: Use Safety Mode for requests
description:
This option adds the possibility to use a safety mode for all requests which can be slowed down!
Following are:
-REPLACING ARMY
-Motivation
-Tavern visiting
-Sniping
-Plundering
-Quest Looper
-PVP-Arena
-Neighbor attacking
-Collect Incidents
-Exploration (Fighting and Negotiating)

name: Use Wave Delay
title: Use 2. Wave Delay for Fighting
description: If activated the delay between Wave 1 and Wave 2 will be set to 500ms, else the second Wave will be instantly fight

name: No Mercy
title: Use No Mercy Mode
description:
!!ATTENTION!!

This is the 'NoMercy Mode'
The Script will perform an amount of fights (as fast as possible) before replacing army!
THIS HAS A VERY HIGH BAN RISK! USE IT ON YOUR OWN RISK

name: GVG Setup
title: GVG Unit/Era Setup
description:
You can create/modify/delete 3 templates (Attack/Defending, deploy defence or deploy siege) for each GVG Province (Iron Age,...)
If nothing found OR you deactivate it, the current army is used.
On entering a specific Province the script checks if the 'Attack Army' template is set and use this as default
Depending on the action, it will change the units after you press 'Attack'/'Defend', deploy 'Defence' or deploy 'Siege'
